feed.title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

entry.title: [dolibarr/dolibarr] Dolibarr ERP and CRM contain XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
Dolibarr CRM/ERP 10.0.3 allows viewimage.php?file= Stored XSS due to JavaScript execution in an SVG image for a profile picture.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-19206
  • https://medium.com/@k43p/cve-2019-19206-stored-xss-due-to-javascript-execution-in-an-svg-file-ee1d038fba76
  • https://www.dolibarr.org/forum/dolibarr-changelogs
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-f6h3-66xr-hqr2

entry.title: [pagekit/pagekit] Pagekit File Upload vulnerability
entry.content:
A CSRF vulnerability in Pagekit 1.0.17 allows an attacker to upload an arbitrary file by removing the CSRF token from a request.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-19013
  • https://packetstormsecurity.com/files/155426/Pagekit-CMS-1.0.17-Cross-Site-Request-Forgery.html
  • https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/security-products/gemnasium-db/-/commit/fdf885ccf7c57c69f4d256bbb3ec76a927267a2b
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-692x-89xv-64jx

entry.title: [pimcore/pimcore] Pimcore Discloses Usernames In Use
entry.content:
Pimcore before 6.2.2 allow attackers to brute-force (guess) valid usernames by using the 'forgot password' functionality as it returns distinct messages for invalid password and non-existing users.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-18986
  • https://github.com/pimcore/pimcore/commit/4a7bba5c3f818852cbbd29fa124f7fb09a207185
  • https://github.com/pimcore/pimcore/compare/v6.2.1...v6.2.2
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8889-9g3f-73rj

entry.title: [pimcore/pimcore] Pimcore Access Control Issues
entry.content:
Pimcore before 6.2.2 lacks an Access Denied outcome for a certain scenario of an incorrect recipient ID of a notification.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-18981
  • https://github.com/pimcore/pimcore/commit/0a5d80b2593b2ebe35d19756b730ba33aa049106
  • https://github.com/pimcore/pimcore/compare/v6.2.1...v6.2.2
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jhcf-j4hg-v64r

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability
entry.content:
In Magento prior to 1.9.4.3, Magento prior to 1.14.4.3, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, and Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1, an authenticated user with administrative privileges for the import feature can execute arbitrary code through a race condition that allows webserver configuration file modification.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8232
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20211209030216/https://magento.com/security/patches/supee-11219
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-6vc8-3xf2-qrxx

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability
entry.content:
In Magento prior to 1.9.4.3, Magento prior to 1.14.4.3, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, and Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1, an authenticated user with administrative privileges for the import feature can execute arbitrary code through a race condition that allows webserver configuration file modification.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8232
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20211209030216/https://magento.com/security/patches/supee-11219
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-6vc8-3xf2-qrxx

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XML Injection
entry.content:
An XPath entity injection vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An attacker can craft a GET request to page cache block rendering module that gets passed to XML data processing engine without validation. The crafted key/value GET request data allows an attacker to limited access to underlying XML data.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8158
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8p5c-f836-m4h7

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XML Injection
entry.content:
An XPath entity injection vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An attacker can craft a GET request to page cache block rendering module that gets passed to XML data processing engine without validation. The crafted key/value GET request data allows an attacker to limited access to underlying XML data.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8158

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition SSRF vulnerability
entry.content:
A server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user with admin privileges to modify store configurations can manipulate the connector api endpoint to enable remote code execution.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8156
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-775w-gx3f-4j4f

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition SSRF vulnerability
entry.content:
A server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user with admin privileges to modify store configurations can manipulate the connector api endpoint to enable remote code execution.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8156
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-775w-gx3f-4j4f

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability
entry.content:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user with privileges to manipulate layouts and images can insert a malicious payload into the page layout.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8150
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-p783-gj6m-9r88

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability
entry.content:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user with privileges to manipulate layouts and images can insert a malicious payload into the page layout.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8150

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in in Magento 1 prior to 1.9.4.3 and 1.14.4.3, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user with access to the wysiwyg editor can abuse the blockDirective() function and inject malicious javascript in the cache of the admin dashboard.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8152
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20211209030216/https://magento.com/security/patches/supee-11219
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jjmg-xmq2-g6ff

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in in Magento 1 prior to 1.9.4.3 and 1.14.4.3, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user with access to the wysiwyg editor can abuse the blockDirective() function and inject malicious javascript in the cache of the admin dashboard.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8152
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20211209030216/https://magento.com/security/patches/supee-11219
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jjmg-xmq2-g6ff

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user can inject arbitrary JavaScript code via customer attribute label.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8147
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-v8fg-p27h-mxjp

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user can inject arbitrary JavaScript code via customer attribute label.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8147

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-v8fg-p27h-mxjp

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user can inject arbitrary JavaScript code when adding a new customer attribute for stores.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8146
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-6m27-3r8q-c7f7

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An authenticated user can inject arbitrary JavaScript code when adding a new customer attribute for stores.

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability
entry.content:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3 or 2.3.2-p1. An unauthenticated user can insert a malicious payload through PageBuilder template methods.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8144
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-vpg9-gq7j-mxqg

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition RCE Vulnerability
entry.content:
A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.19, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.10, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.3. An authenticated user with administrative privileges (system level import) can execute arbitrary code through a Phar deserialization vulnerability in the import functionality.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-8141
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051105/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.3-and-2.2.10-security-update
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-9wr9-fw9v-8fgr
